meanings.sent2: She realized the cake was miscooked when it came out of the oven.
meanings.sent3: The miscooked pasta was so hard, it could be used as a weapon.
meanings.sent4: The miscooked steak was like a rubber tire on the plate.
meanings.sent5: The miscooked vegetables were a disaster, crunchy and raw.

meanings.sent1: The miscooked rice was still hard in the middle.
meanings.sent2: He complained about the miscooked fries at the restaurant.
meanings.sent3: The miscooked eggs were so runny, they looked like soup.
meanings.sent4: The miscooked soup was just warm water with vegetables floating in it.
meanings.sent5: The miscooked pasta was a mushy mess, not even close to al dente.
